name: Perceive Cues
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a drop of water)
text: Your senses become preternaturally keen, and you gain insight into subtle behavioral cues. For the duration of the spell, you receive a +5 competence bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一滴水)
text_zh:
你的感官变得无比敏锐，让你可以察觉那些平时没有注意的细节。

在法术持续时间内，你在察觉和察言观色检定中获得+5表现价值。
